name: Bible Wars
shortDescription: A turn-based Bible trivia game where players spin the wheel, answer questions, and compete in faith-filled battles of knowledge.
fullDescription:
Bible Wars is a faith-based trivia game that combines fun, learning, and friendly competition. Players take turns answering Bible-themed questions, earning points, and climbing the leaderboard.

  • Turn-Based Play: Challenge others and play at your own paceâ€”no need to be online at the same time.
  • Spin & Answer: Spin the wheel to land on different categories from stories to characters.
  • Power-Ups: Use Double Chance, Miracle, or Change Question to gain an edge.
  • Leaderboards: Track your progress and see how you rank among other players.
